name: CRAPitalism
description:
Heavily inspired by Molleindustria's, Every Day the Same Dream, and the film, iRobot.

This minimalistic game is designed to imply a message about where the world could be headed in a short, third person, 2D platformer.

Production Period: 3 weeks

MEET THE TEAM!

Matthew Finlay - Game Programmer

Regine Caramancion - Game Designer

Rico Zantua - Graphic Designer

Andy Luu - Graphic Designer

Yehuda Vanuel - Audio Engineer

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

SPACE to enter

Developer Notes:

-CRapp Store not completely functional
